Product Description: ['Shetland Season Four (DVD)', 'Award-winning crime writer Ann Cleeves’ bestselling detective series returns for a fourth season as DI Jimmy Perez (Douglas Henshall, Primeval) faces a gripping new single mystery. When Thomas Malone has his murder conviction overturned after 23 years behind bars, DI Perez has to reopen the investigation into the 1994 death of local teenager Lizzie Kilmuir.']

Sherlock: The Abominable Bride [DVD]
Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Drama
['Benedict Cumberbatch (The Imitation Game) and Martin Freeman (The Hobbit) return as Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson in the acclaimed modern retelling of Arthur Conan Doyle’s classic stories. But what if this wasn’t the modern day? What if it was the late Victorian period? What if the world’s most famous consulting detective and his best friend lived in a Baker Street of steam trains, hansom cabs, top hats and frock-coats? Welcome to Sherlock in 1895!', 'Bonus Content:', '• Mark Gatiss: A Study in Sherlock – 30-minute “making of” documentary • Mark Gatiss: Production Diary • Creating the Look – Eight inside looks into how different scenes were created in the Sherlock Special • Interview with the writers Steven Moffat and Mark Gatiss • Sherlockology Q&A', ']]>']

Midsomer Murders, Series 7 (Reissue)
John Nettles  (Actor),     John Hopkins  (Actor),     Sarah Hellings  (Director),     Peter Smith  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Mystery & Thrillers
['“TV gold” —', 'Entertainment Today', 'Welcome to England’s most murderous county. . .  The English village mystery gets a contemporary spin in this hit British television series that has earned a worldwide following. Bucolic settings harbor macabre crimes and eccentric characters that are no match for nice-guy detective Tom Barnaby (John Nettles,', 'Bergerac', ') and his new assistant, Sergeant Dan Scott (John Hopkins,', 'Love in a Cold Climate', '). “Delightful in a murderously charming way” (', 'Leonard Maltin’s Movie Crazy', '). Guest stars include Henry Ian Cusick, Jim Carter, Stella Gonet, Freddie Jones, Cherie Lunghi, and Henry Cavill.  THE MYSTERIES (original U.K. broadcast order)', 'The Green Man', '—Troy passes his inspector’s exam and has one last case with Barnaby.', 'Bad Tidings', '—Barnaby’s new partner gets a baptism by fire with a case implicating Cully’s old schoolmates.', 'The Fisher King', '—A maze of Celtic rites masks a murderer.', 'Sins of Commission', '—The detectives discover a hotbed of corruption within a highbrow literary crowd.', 'The Maid in Splendour', '—A local pub figures in a case involving secret business deals and unrequited love.  Now with SDH subtitles.  Mysteries previously released in Sets 7 and 8.']

John Nettles  (Actor),     Peter Smith  (Director),     Renny Rye  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, TV
['"Now in original U.K. broadcast order “Superbly acted and filmed” —', 'British Heritage', 'magazine Welcome to England’s most murderous county. . . The English village mystery gets a contemporary spin in this hit British television series that has earned a worldwide following. Bucolic settings harbor macabre crimes and eccentric characters that are no match for nice-guy detective Tom Barnaby (John Nettles,', 'Bergerac', ') and his new assistant, Detective Constable Ben Jones (Jason Hughes,', 'This Life', '). “Delightful in a murderously charming way” (Leonard Maltin’s', 'Movie Crazy', '). Guest stars include Simon Callow, George Baker, Siân Phillips, Elizabeth Spriggs, Julia McKenzie, and Peter Capaldi. THE MYSTERIES (original U.K. broadcast order)', 'The House in the Woods', '—A young couple dies on a property that’s rumored to be haunted.', 'Dead Letters', '—The mother of a former festival queen drowns herself during Oak Apple Week. But is it really suicide?', 'Vixen’s Run', '—A thrice-married baronet keels over dead, leaving an estate worth killing for.', 'Down Among the Dead Men', '—An accountant’s slaying leads Barnaby and Jones on a trail of blackmail.', 'Four Funerals and a Wedding', '—An age-old battle of the sexes turns deadly at the Skimmington Fayre.', 'Country Matters', '—A mysterious man turns up murdered on the proposed site of a contentious new supermarket.', 'Death in Chorus', '—The tenor of Midsomer Worthy’s choir is killed prior to a big competition.', 'Last Year’s Model', '—Barnaby has second thoughts about a woman’s guilt as she goes on trial for murder. Now with SDH subtitles Mysteries previously released in Sets 11 and 12.']

The Lady in the Van
Maggie Smith  (Actor),     Alex Jennings  (Actor),     Nicholas Hytner  (Director, Producer)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles
['Based on the true story of Miss Shepherd (played by a magnificent Maggie Smith), a woman of uncertain origins “temporarily” parks her van in Alan Bennett’s (Alex Jennings) London driveway and proceeds to live there for 15 years. What begins as a begrudged favor becomes a relationship that will change both their lives.Acclaimed director Nicholas Hytner reunites with iconic writer Alan Bennett to create this rare and touching portrait.']

Major Crimes: The Complete Fourth Season (DVD)
Mary McDonnell  (Actor),     G.W. Bailey  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama
['Major Crimes: The Complete Fourth Season (DVD)', 'Phillip Stroh may be gone, but Major Crimes is back! The powerful crime drama featuring some of TV’s favorite characters continues for another season of gripping cases, as law enforcement officers and prosecutors work together to score a conviction. Led by the Oscar®-nominated Mary McDonnell as Los Angeles Police Chief Sharon Raydor, the fantastic ensemble cast also features G.W. Bailey, Tony Denison, Michael Paul Chan, Raymond Cruz, Kearran Giovanni, Graham Patrick Martin, Phillip P. Keene, Jonathan Del Arco and Robert Gossett. Season four focuses on themes of courage, both in the personal and professional lives of the squad. Plus, Rusty, who is now officially adopted by Sharon, finds a passion that drives him — something Provenza is not too pleased about. Major Crimes continues to rank as one of basic cable’s Top 10 original series.', ']]>']

The Big Short
Melissa Leo  (Actor),     Christian Bale  (Actor)    Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Award Winners in Movies & TV, Oscar Central, Oscar Nominees
['In the mid-2000s, hedge fund manager Michael Burry (Christian Bale) took a hard look at the subprime mortgage market...and saw the tidal wave of borrower defaults to come. As a handful of financial industry insiders watched him bet billions against the very stability of the banks, they felt themselves torn between knowing the consequence of collapse...and getting themselves a very lucrative piece of that action. Adam McKay’s trenchant take on the ‘08 economic crisis, inspired by the Michael Lewis bestseller, also stars Steve Carell, Ryan Gosling, Brad Pitt, Marisa Tomei, Hamish Linklater. 130 minutes']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user continues to embrace Comedy and Romantic Comedies, while their interest in Drama has evolved to include complex narratives. Their latest purchase reflects a strong appreciation for nuanced storytelling within the drama genre, particularly in series format.

- **Actor and Director Favorability:** The user maintains a preference for skilled actors and has shown enthusiasm for performances by established talent. Their recent purchase highlights a continued focus on strong performances, reinforcing their enjoyment of character-driven narratives.

- **Content Rating:** While the user historically favored family-friendly and PG-13 content, their openness to diverse genres indicates a willingness to explore more mature themes. Their recent acquisition signifies a balanced approach to content selection.

- **Format Preference:** The user remains committed to physical media, particularly DVDs, demonstrating a keen interest in collecting series noted for their rich narratives and character development.

- **Overall Sentiment:** The user displays a positive outlook on film and television, providing thoughtful reviews that reflect a deep appreciation for storytelling. Their latest review exemplifies an ongoing enthusiasm for engaging content.

- **Engagement Style:** Their concise and reflective reviews continue to showcase a discerning view of varied narratives, with recent feedback indicating a sustained critical engagement with beloved series, emphasizing both enjoyment and anticipation for future releases.
